title: Creepy Intense
description: When you **reason with someone**, on any hit, if they flatly refuse to go along with you, you can choose to inflict Ψ-harm. You also get +1Ψ (max 3-Ψ).

title: Frenzy (+Weird)
description: When you speak the truth to a mob, roll+Weird.

outcomes.text: Hold 3 against the mob. Spend your hold 1 for 1 to make the mob:
bullets: Bring people forward, by name or description, and deliver them to you.
Bring forward all their precious things as offerings to you or to the world's psychic maelstrom.
Unite and fight for you as a gang (2-harm, 0-armor). Choose their number and their impulse with the MC. While they remain united, you get **leadership**.
Fall into uninhibited emotional excess: celebrating, lamenting, cowering, fighting, as you choose.
Go quietly back to their lives.

title: Out on the Edge (Requires a Cult)
description: Add an option to your cult. You also get +1Ψ (max 3-Ψ).

title: Unsettling Presence (+Weird)
description: When you enter into a nonviolent situation, roll+Weird.

bullets: Someone here becomes afraid of you, and moves back in a panic. Ask the MC who does.
Someone here becomes fascinated with you, and stares intently. Ask the MC who does.
Someone here becomes dissatisfied with their life, and they flinch. Ask the MC who does.

outcomes.text: Someone here dismisses you with a sneer. Ask the MC who does.

title: Piercing Visions
description: Once per session, at any moment you choose, you can tell the MC you've had a piercing vision. Choose 1:

bullets: Ask the MC what storm is gathering, what is stirring in its sleep, or what is waiting to be born.
Name a person. Ask the MC which gods or dead things attend them.
Name a place or a thing. Ask the MC who loves it, who owns it, and who hungers for it.

title: Showy Weapons
pickOne: **A custom-made short-barrel shotgun** (*4-harm, close, messy, ammo: 2*)
**An honest to god sword, a decorated cavalry saber** (*3-harm, hand*)
**A huge-bore vintage revolver** (*4-harm, close, loud, ammo: 6*)

title: Improvements
description: Choose 2 Hocus moves. Your cult gives you devotion and its options might give you additional standard moves as well.. At 6Xp, choose an improvement and erase.
pick: Get a move from an unused playbook
Get a move from an unused playbook
